definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
semifeudal and semicolonial (the official Marxist description of China in the late Qing and under the Guomindang)
pinyin: ban4 feng1 jian4 ban4 zhi2 min2 di4

sentences.english: Brita in grant her colony independence in the year after the second world war.
sentences.chinese: 二进制战后的年代理英国准许其殖民地独立。

sentences.english: A self-governing colony of denmark on the faro e islands.
sentences.chinese: 法罗群岛上的自治丹麦殖民地。

sentences.english: In 1814, Malta became a part of the British Empire.
sentences.chinese: 1814年，马耳他岛沦为大英帝国的殖民地。

sentences.english: The same is very much the case in Africa's fragile post-colonial nations.
sentences.chinese: 这一点，对于非洲广大后殖民地国家来说，同样如此。

sentences.english: This is the home of Plymouth Colony, first settled in 1620;
sentences.chinese: 于1620年开始在这儿建立普利茅斯殖民地。

sentences.english: In 1960, Britain granted independence to the crown colony of Cyprus.
sentences.chinese: 在1960年，英国承认其殖民地赛普勒斯的独立。

sentences.english: In the colonies outside New England, no strict theocracies had been set up.
sentences.chinese: 新英格兰以外的殖民地并没有实行严格的神权统治。

sentences.english: Who is the assassin who appears to be stalking Roslin in "Colonial Day"?
sentences.chinese: 谁是在殖民地日接近罗斯林的暗杀者？

sentences.english: Colonization took place during the Habsburg dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 开拓殖民地在哈布斯堡王朝就进行过。

sentences.english: The unscrupulous governor attempted to sabotage the Roon Colonial Games.
sentences.chinese: 这位不择手段的总督企图破坏鲁恩殖民地运动会。

sentences.english: Winslow quickly became one of the more prominent men in the colony.
sentences.chinese: 温斯洛很快就成了殖民地的知名人物。

sentences.english: The newly-occupied Italian colony of Libya rose in revolt in 1914.
sentences.chinese: 意大利新占领的殖民地利比亚于1914年发生叛乱。

sentences.english: The US has two areas of land that can be considered colonies, and also commonwealths.
sentences.chinese: 美国有两块土地被称为殖民地，或联邦。

sentences.english: After the Opium War of 1840 -1842, China slowly became semi - colonial and semi - feudal society country.
sentences.chinese: 鸦片战争后，中国逐渐沦为半殖民地半封建国家。

sentences.english: Oslash; The Micromaster colony on Paradron is discovered.
sentences.chinese: 帕拉多星上发现微型战士殖民地。

sentences.english: As the colonies gained independence, English continued to be used alongside the vernaculars .
sentences.chinese: 当殖民地赢得独立，英语随着本地语一起继续被使用。
